article.title: Handbook of the National and International Libraries
article.author: Fang, J.R.
article.text: Two methods were used: (1) A thorough search of professional literature, principally since 1965, with exceptions in cases where no later information was available, and (2) direct communication with associations through a questionnaire and consultation of supplementary material provided by the associations. The final result of the authors' search was a total of 319 library associations, 33 international in scope and 286 national (see Statistical Data).
